title: Keir Starmer, Set To Be Next UK PM, Changed Party's Stance On Kashmir
content: One of the first challenges for Keir Starmer as the UK Prime Minister will be to restore the Labour Party's ties with India, which has been tumultuous due to their remarks on Kashmir. Starmer led the party to a landslide win.
summary: One of the first challenges for Keir Starmer as the UK Prime Minister will be to restore the Labour Party's ties with India, which has been tumultuous due to their remarks on Kashmir. Starmer led the party to a landslide win.

title: "My Highest-Ever": Count Binface Who Fought Against Rishi Sunak
content: Count Binface, the self-proclaimed "intergalactic space warrior," who contested against Rishi Sunak from the Richmond parliamentary seat in the UK general elections, celebrated his personal best in his fledgling political career: a 6th place finish.
summary: Count Binface, the self-proclaimed "intergalactic space warrior," who contested against Rishi Sunak from the Richmond parliamentary seat in the UK general elections, celebrated his personal best in his fledgling political career: a 6th place finish.

title: Ryanair Airlines Offers "A Seat" To Outgoing UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak
content: Taking a swipe at Rishi Sunak, whose party has lost the UK election, European Airlines Ryanair said in a post on X that they have got a "seat" for the outgoing British Prime Minister.
summary: Taking a swipe at Rishi Sunak, whose party has lost the UK election, European Airlines Ryanair said in a post on X that they have got a "seat" for the outgoing British Prime Minister.

title: Taiwan Urges China To Avoid Escalation Amid Renewed Military Activity
content: Taiwan on Friday reported renewed Chinese military activity nearby with another "combat patrol" as the government called on Beijing not to escalate tensions after the seizure of a Taiwanese fishing boat.
summary: Taiwan on Friday reported renewed Chinese military activity nearby with another "combat patrol" as the government called on Beijing not to escalate tensions after the seizure of a Taiwanese fishing boat.

title: "UK Gets Its Future Back": Labour's Keir Starmer In Victory Speech
content: Labour's Sir Keir Starmer delivered a storming victory speech Friday morning after the party swept the UK general election, declaring the country "gets its future back after 14 years (of a Conservative Party government)".
summary: Labour's Sir Keir Starmer delivered a storming victory speech Friday morning after the party swept the UK general election, declaring the country "gets its future back after 14 years (of a Conservative Party government)".

title: "I Am Sorry": UK PM Rishi Sunak Concedes Defeat In UK Polls
content: UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has conceded defeat in the country's general elections as the trends showed that the Opposition Labour Party had won over 300 seats, while Sunak's Conservative Party is ahead on 61.
summary: UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has conceded defeat in the country's general elections as the trends showed that the Opposition Labour Party had won over 300 seats, while Sunak's Conservative Party is ahead on 61.

title: Keir Starmer To Be Next UK PM: What This Means For India
content: Labour Party chief Keir Starmer is on course to replace Rishi Sunak as the Britain Prime Minister, with early election results pointing at a crushing loss for the Conservatives.

title: "A Massacre": Conservative Leader As Labour Heads For Massive UK Win
content: Scottish Conservative Party leader Ruth Davison described the UK exit poll prediction of a historic defeat for her party as a "massacre". As the votes are being counted, UK PM Rishi Sunak's Conservative party is staring at a massive loss.
summary: Scottish Conservative Party leader Ruth Davison described the UK exit poll prediction of a historic defeat for her party as a "massacre". As the votes are being counted, UK PM Rishi Sunak's Conservative party is staring at a massive loss.

title: Keir Starmer, On Course To Become Next UK PM, Wins Home Constituency
content: UK Labour Party chief Keir Starmer has emerged victorious from his home seat in London as he inches closer to replace Rishi Sunak as the Prime Minister.
summary: UK Labour Party chief Keir Starmer has emerged victorious from his home seat in London as he inches closer to replace Rishi Sunak as the Prime Minister.

title: Ex-Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro Accused In Saudi Jewel Scandal
content: Brazil's former president Jair Bolsonaro is facing possible money laundering and other charges related to undeclared diamond jewelry gifted by Saudi Arabia, local media reported Thursday.
summary: Brazil's former president Jair Bolsonaro is facing possible money laundering and other charges related to undeclared diamond jewelry gifted by Saudi Arabia, local media reported Thursday.

title: OpenAI's Internal System Hacked, AI Tech Details Stolen In 2023: Report
content: A hacker gained access to the internal messaging systems at OpenAI last year and stole details about the design of the company's artificial intelligence technologies, the New York Times reported on Thursday.
summary: A hacker gained access to the internal messaging systems at OpenAI last year and stole details about the design of the company's artificial intelligence technologies, the New York Times reported on Thursday.

title: Labour Sweeps UK Polls, Rishi Sunak's Party Ousted For 1st Time In 14 Years
content: Keir Starmer's Labour Party scored a landslide victory in the UK general elections, a result that reflects a seismic realignment in British politics as Rishi Sunak's Conservative Party imploded.
summary: Keir Starmer's Labour Party scored a landslide victory in the UK general elections, a result that reflects a seismic realignment in British politics as Rishi Sunak's Conservative Party imploded.

title: Bali Coral Reefs Ruined By Bleaching As Sea Temperature Rises
content: Indonesian conservationist Nyoman Sugiarto has been working for 16 years to preserve coral on the reefs of Bali, but the frequency of mass coral bleachings he says is now devastating.
summary: Indonesian conservationist Nyoman Sugiarto has been working for 16 years to preserve coral on the reefs of Bali, but the frequency of mass coral bleachings he says is now devastating.

title: Labour Heads For Landslide Win In UK, Rishi Sunak Far Behind: Early Trends
content: Britain's main opposition Labour party looks set for a landslide election win, exit polls indicated on Thursday, with Keir Starmer replacing Rishi Sunak as prime minister, ending 14 years of Conservative rule.
summary: Britain's main opposition Labour party looks set for a landslide election win, exit polls indicated on Thursday, with Keir Starmer replacing Rishi Sunak as prime minister, ending 14 years of Conservative rule.

title: Pak To Ban All Social Media Platforms For 6 Days To Curb 'Hate Material'
content: The Pakistan government is now set to ban all social media platforms -- YouTube, WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram and TikTok -- for six days from July 13 to 18, citing the need to control "hate material" during the Islamic month of Ramadan.
summary: The Pakistan government is now set to ban all social media platforms -- YouTube, WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram and TikTok -- for six days from July 13 to 18, citing the need to control "hate material" during the Islamic month of Ramadan.

title: What Will UK Foreign Policy Look Like Under Labour's Keir Starmer?
content: The first month of a Keir Starmer premiership will be a whirlwind of international diplomacy including meetings with US President Joe Biden and European leaders.

title: Keir Starmer: Ex-Rights Lawyer, Musician Set To Take Labour Back To Power
content: UK Labour leader Keir Starmer is an ex-human rights lawyer and public prosecutor who will have to focus his relentless work ethic and methodical mind to fixing the country.

title: What Does UK's Labour Want To Do?
content: Britain's Labour party, predicted to win Thursday's election, is promising a "decade of national renewal" and with a record landslide that gives the party a free reign to implement its programme.

title: Israeli Army Officer Killed In Hezbollah Rocket Attack
content: An Israeli army officer was killed in Hezbollah rocket fire on Thursday, the Israeli military said in a press statement.
summary: An Israeli army officer was killed in Hezbollah rocket fire on Thursday, the Israeli military said in a press statement.
